# setNetwork(_:)

**Instance Method**

Set the network that conveys the confidence level.

## Declaration

```swift
func setNetwork(_ network: NEHotspotNetwork)
```

## Parameters

- **network**: The annotated [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotNetwork] object. This must be the same object that was passed in the corresponding [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperCommand] object.

## Discussion

In response to the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperCommandType/evaluate] command, the Hotspot Helper app sets the confidence level on the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotNetwork] object provided with the command and calls this method to convey the confidence level to the system.

## Response properties

- **setNetworkList(_:)**: Set the list of handled networks.

items.description: Set the list of handled networks.
items.name: setNetworkList(_:)
